actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to exclude from the operation of such Act matters relating to the age at which individuals may be hired, or discharged from employment, as firefighters and law enforcement officers by States and political subdivisions of States.
short_title: Age Discrimination in Employment Act Public Safety Officers Amendments of 1984

summary.text: Age Discrimination in Employment Act Public Safety Officers Amendments of 1984 - Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to exclude State and local law enforcement officers and firefighters from coverage under the Act.

titles.title: Age Discrimination in Employment Act Public Safety Officers Amendments of 1984

A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to exclude from the operation of such Act matters relating to the age at which individuals may be hired, or discharged from employment, as firefighters and law enforcement officers by States and political subdivisions of States.
